channel.title: Vcs on Fintech VC List - Financial Technology Venture Capitalists
channel.description: Recent content in Vcs on Fintech VC List - Financial Technology Venture Capitalists

item.title: Andreessen Horowitz (a16z)
item.description: Andreessen Horowitz (a16z) is a Silicon Valley venture capital firm with dedicated funds for AI. They’ve been aggressive investors in generative AI startups and maintain a strong thesis around AI infrastructure and applications.

item.title: General Catalyst
item.description: General Catalyst focuses on transformative companies across AI, healthcare, and fintech. They take a hands-on approach with portfolio companies and have a strong track record in healthcare AI applications.

item.title: Sequoia Capital
item.description: Sequoia Capital is one of the most prestigious venture capital firms globally, with a strong focus on AI and enterprise technology. Known for backing companies like Apple, Google, and Airbnb early on, they continue to lead investments in cutting-edge AI infrastructure and applications.
